snippet.title: This Side of Me - Trailer
snippet.description:
​Many of our fears are based on false beliefs, and social anxiety is a good example of it. For those who suffer this kind of trouble, even a party can become a hardship.
This Side of Me explores the mechanisms at work in this type of fear and hints how to  cope with them in a short interactive story. 

This game was made by five students in two and a half months at the CNAM-ENJMIN​, French school of games and interactive digital media​.
